title: Help needed
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Shampoo_5065.jpg)

I’d be very pleased if anyone could identify this font.

 [‹ Madvillain - uneven squarish sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234909/http:/typophile.com/node/49959 "Go to previous forum topic") [centro logo font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081004234909/http:/typophile.com/node/50099 "Go to next forum topic")
author: v_ctor

comments.content: It’s Ogirema by Manfred Klein, except for ‘RESTAURADOR’. Indeed it’s very similar to Gerard Unger’s typefaces.
